content:
I see we have iron ore in our inventory but the drill isn't producing more. Let's fix the drill first to get a steady supply of iron ore:

```python
# First check drill status
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]
print(f"Drill at {drill.position}, status: {drill.status}")

# Move to drill
move_to(drill.position)
print("Moved to drill")

# Check if drill has fuel
if not drill.fuel:
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)
    print("Added fuel to drill")

# Check if drill is over iron ore
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
if iron_pos:
    print(f"Found iron ore at {iron_pos}")
    if drill.status == EntityStatus.NO_MINABLE_RESOURCES:
        # Pick up and move drill to iron ore
        pickup_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, drill.position)
        move_to(iron_pos)
        drill = place_entity(
            Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill,
            position=iron_pos,
            direction=Direction.RIGHT
        )
        print(f"Moved drill to iron ore at {drill.position}")
        # Add fuel again after moving
        insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)

# Wait for drill to mine
print("Waiting for drill to mine...")
sleep(5)

# Check drill output
print(f"Drill inventory after mining: {inspect_inventory(drill)}")
print(f"Drill status: {drill.status}")

# Now let's get the ore to a furnace
furnace = min(get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}), 
             key=lambda f: abs(f.position.x - drill.position.x) + abs(f.position.y - drill.position.y))
print(f"Found closest furnace at {furnace.position}")

# Move ore from drill to furnace
move_to(drill.position)
drill_contents = inspect_inventory(drill)
if Prototype.IronOre in drill_contents:
    ore_amount = drill_contents[Prototype.IronOre]
    extract_item(Prototype.IronOre, drill.position, ore_amount)
    print(f"Extracted {ore_amount} iron ore from drill")
    
    move_to(furnace.position)
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=ore_amount)
    print("Added fuel and ore to furnace")

print(f"Final inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Furnace contents: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")
```

This script should:
1. Check and fix the drill's position and fuel
2. Wait for it to mine some ore
3. Move the ore to a furnace for smelting
4. Add fuel to the furnace

Let's see if this gets our iron production working!
